abstract: Internal Revenue Service notifies Coca-Cola it owes them $3.3 billion more in federal taxes, and interest, for 2007 to 2009.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola was notified by the Internal Revenue Service that it owes $3.3 billion more in federal taxes, and interest, for 2007 to 2009.

headline.main: I.R.S. Says Coca-Cola Owes $3.3. Billion in Taxes
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Says Coca-Cola Owes $3.3. Billion in Taxes

snippet: Coca-Cola was notified by the Internal Revenue Service that it owes $3.3 billion more in federal taxes, and interest, for 2007 to 2009.
